column5: A very cozy home/room in a quiet neighborhood in THE WOODLANDS TEXAS. Located approx. 1 mile to Texas Children Hosp, 1/2 mile to Methodist Hosp. of The Woodlands & St Luke's Catholic Hosp. 1 1/2 miles to Nexus Specialty Hosp. Long Term Acute Care. Sleeping arrangements can accommodate 2 people who want to sleep on a king-bed or 2 singles, and 1 person. 2 mi approx to the Woodlands Mall
